msg: Hi!
Hello! How are you today?
I'm doing alright, thank you! You?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking. Are you ready to practice some oral English today?
Sure!
Great! Let's start with a common topic: What did you do over the weekend?
I usually don't work on Saturday, I gone out and bought bubble teas last Saturday, watching TV shows at home. And in the Sunday, I go to the church, sing songs and meet up with friends.

Good job! Just a few corrections: 

- Instead of "I usually don't work on Saturday," you can say "I usually don't work on Saturdays."
- Instead of "I gone out," you can say "I went out."
- Instead of "watching TV shows at home," you can say "I watched TV shows at home."
- Instead of "in the Sunday," you can say "on Sunday."

So the corrected sentence would be: "I usually don't work on Saturdays. Last Saturday, I went out and bought bubble tea, and watched TV shows at home. On Sunday, I went to church, sang songs, and met up with friends." 

Great job overall! Let's move on to the next topic. How about we talk about your favorite hobby? What do you like to do in your free time?
I like cooking  CHinese food

Great! Cooking is a fun and useful hobby. Here's a corrected sentence: "I like cooking Chinese food." 

Can you tell me more about your favorite Chinese dish to cook?
I like cooking spicy boiled fish.
That sounds delicious! Spicy boiled fish is a popular Sichuan dish. Have you ever tried making it with different types of fish or adding any other ingredients to the dish?
Not really, usually with the same seabass and I woud add a lot of beansprouts.

That's a good choice! Seabass is a great fish to use for spicy boiled fish, and adding bean sprouts is a great way to add some texture and nutrition to the dish. Have you ever tried using other types of vegetables or spices to make the dish even more flavorful?
Hmm, CHinese leaf!

That's a great idea! Chinese leaf, also known as Napa cabbage, is a common ingredient in many Chinese dishes and would be a great addition to your spicy boiled fish. You could also try adding some Sichuan peppercorns or dried chili peppers to give the dish an extra kick of flavor and spice. 

Remember, the more you experiment with different ingredients and spices, the more you can develop your cooking skills and create unique and delicious dishes. Keep up the good work!
Thank you!
You're welcome! Do you have any other topics you would like to practice today?
Nope, can you come up?
Sure, how about we talk about your favorite place to travel to? Where have you been and what did you enjoy about it?
I been to Durham, a beautiful city in UK! I went to see the Cathedral and I like the city because it's very tranquil and beautiful!

That sounds like a wonderful trip! Durham is a historic city in northeast England known for its stunning cathedral and castle. It's great to hear that you enjoyed the tranquility and beauty of the city. 

Here's a corrected sentence: "I have been to Durham, a beautiful city in the UK. I went to see the Cathedral and I liked the city because it was very tranquil and beautiful."

Have you traveled to any other cities or countries that you enjoyed?
I have been to Cambridge, it's so nice as well! I went to see the university and the city center there!

Cambridge is another beautiful city in the UK, known for its prestigious university and stunning architecture. It's great to hear that you enjoyed your visit there as well. 

Here's a corrected sentence: "I have also been to Cambridge, which is also a very nice city. I went to see the university and the city center, and I really enjoyed my visit there."

Have you traveled to any other countries or cities that you would like to share?
I also have been to Hong Kong, where I visited my family there! I love the food there so much!

Hong Kong is a vibrant city with a rich culture and delicious food. It's great that you were able to visit your family there and enjoy the local cuisine. 

Here's a corrected sentence: "I have also been to Hong Kong, where I visited my family. I love the food there so much!"

What is your favorite Hong Kong dish?
Beef Ho Fun!

Beef Ho Fun is a classic Cantonese dish that is popular in Hong Kong. It's made with stir-fried flat rice noodles, tender beef, and vegetables in a savory sauce. It's great to hear that you enjoy this dish! 

Remember, trying new foods and experiencing different cultures is a great way to broaden your horizons and learn new things. Keep up the good work!
Sure!
Great! We've covered a few topics today. Remember to keep practicing your oral English skills every day. If you have any questions or need any help, feel free to ask me. Have a great day!
Can we have more new topics to talk about?
Of course! Here's a new topic: What is your favorite type of music and why? Do you have a favorite artist or band?
My favourite music is country music, because they are not too noisy, my favourite singer is Taylor Swift!

That's great! Country music is a popular genre known for its storytelling and heartfelt lyrics. Taylor Swift is a talented singer-songwriter who has won numerous awards for her music. 

Here's a corrected sentence: "My favorite type of music is country music because it's not too noisy. My favorite singer is Taylor Swift."

What is your favorite Taylor Swift song?
Hmmm, hard to choose
I understand, Taylor Swift has many great songs to choose from! Some of her most popular songs include "Love Story," "Shake It Off," and "Blank Space." Do you have a favorite album of hers?
I love the album lover!

"Lover" is a great album! It was released in 2019 and features some of Taylor Swift's most popular songs, including "Lover," "You Need to Calm Down," and "The Man." It's great to hear that you enjoy this album. 

Remember, listening to music is a great way to improve your English skills. You can practice your listening comprehension and learn new vocabulary by listening to English songs and trying to understand the lyrics. Keep up the good work!
It is! I learned a lot of vocabularies from the album

That's great to hear! Music is a fun and effective way to learn new vocabulary and improve your English skills. Keep listening to English songs and trying to understand the lyrics. You can also look up the lyrics online and read along as you listen to the song. This can help you improve your pronunciation and comprehension.
Sure it is!
Great! Do you have any other topics you would like to practice today?
Can you bring up some?
Sure! How about we talk about your favorite book or movie? What is it about and why do you like it?

My favourite book is a CHinese traditional novel called Hong Lou Meng, I especially like the poems in the book, I like the book because it's so real and I can understand how the society were like back then better.

That's great! "Hong Lou Meng," also known as "Dream of the Red Chamber," is a classic Chinese novel that is known for its beautiful language and vivid portrayal of life in 18th century China. It's great to hear that you enjoy the poems in the book and that it has helped you understand the society of that time period better. 

Here's a corrected sentence: "My favorite book is a Chinese traditional novel called Hong Lou Meng. I especially like the poems in the book, and I like it because it's so real and helps me understand how society was like back then better."

Have you read any other Chinese novels that you would recommend?
Yea, I think the three body is great as well!

"The Three-Body Problem" is a science fiction novel by Chinese author Liu Cixin. It's a popular book that has won numerous awards and has been translated into many languages. It's great to hear that you enjoyed reading it! 

Here's a corrected sentence: "I also think 'The Three-Body Problem' is great!"

Remember, reading books is a great way to improve your English skills. You can learn new vocabulary, improve your reading comprehension, and gain a better understanding of different cultures and perspectives. Keep up the good work!
Actually I read it in Chinese.

That's even better! Reading books in your native language is a great way to improve your language skills and gain a deeper understanding of your culture and history. It's great that you are able to read and enjoy books in both Chinese and English. Keep up the good work!
HAHA, thank you!
You're welcome! Do you have any other topics you would like to practice today?
Sure!
How about we talk about your favorite hobby or activity? What do you like to do in your free time and why do you enjoy it?
I like coding. I like solving different problems step by step

That's great! Coding is a useful and rewarding hobby that can help you develop problem-solving skills and creativity. It's great to hear that you enjoy solving different problems step by step. 

Here's a corrected sentence: "I like coding. I enjoy solving different problems step by step."

What programming languages do you know and which one is your favorite?
Can't I say like?

Yes, you can say "like" instead of "enjoy." Both words are commonly used to express enjoyment or pleasure in an activity. So the corrected sentence would be: "I like coding. I like solving different problems step by step."
But that si what I said before

I apologize for the confusion. You are correct, you did use the word "like" in your original response. Here's a corrected sentence: "I like coding. I enjoy solving different problems step by step."

What programming languages do you know and which one is your favorite?
I used Python most, but I also use JavaScript

Python and JavaScript are both popular programming languages that are used for a variety of applications. Python is known for its simplicity and ease of use, while JavaScript is commonly used for web development and creating interactive user interfaces. It's great that you are familiar with both languages! 

Here's a corrected sentence: "I mostly use Python, but I also use JavaScript."

What kind of projects have you worked on using these programming languages?
I coded a recommender system im python before.

That's impressive! Recommender systems are a popular application of machine learning and data analysis, and can be used in a variety of industries such as e-commerce, entertainment, and social media. It's great that you were able to develop a recommender system using Python. 

Remember, practicing coding and working on projects is a great way to improve your skills and gain experience. Keep up the good work!
Sure!
Great! Do you have any other topics you would like to practice today?
Maybe you could ask me some!
Sure, how about we talk about your favorite travel destination? Where have you been and what did you enjoy about it?
Can you have some new topics?
Of course! How about we talk about your favorite sport or physical activity? What do you like about it and how often do you participate in it?
I like running, because it's relaxing.

That's great! Running is a popular physical activity that can help you improve your cardiovascular health, reduce stress, and boost your mood. It's great to hear that you find it relaxing. 

Here's a corrected sentence: "I like running because it's relaxing."

Do you have a favorite place to run or a favorite running route?
Run by the river in my university town

That sounds like a beautiful place to run! Running by the river can be a great way to enjoy nature and get some fresh air while exercising. It's great that you have a favorite running route in your university town. 

Remember, regular exercise is important for maintaining good health and reducing stress. Keep up the good work!
Sure!
Great! Do you have any other topics you would like to practice today?
Can you comig up with new topics?
Sure! How about we talk about your favorite food or cuisine? What do you like about it and do you have a favorite dish?
I like eating hot pot!

That's great! Hot pot is a popular Chinese dish that is enjoyed by many people around the world. It's a type of soup that is cooked at the table, with a variety of meats, vegetables, and other ingredients added to the pot. It's great to hear that you enjoy eating hot pot.

Here's a corrected sentence: "I like eating hot pot!"

Do you have a favorite type of hot pot or a favorite ingredient to add to the pot?
I like spicy one and liked add a lot of vegetables.

That sounds delicious! Spicy hot pot is a popular variation of the dish that is known for its bold and flavorful taste. Adding lots of vegetables is a great way to make the dish healthier and more nutritious. 

Here's a corrected sentence: "I like spicy hot pot and I like to add a lot of vegetables."

Remember, trying new foods and experiencing different cuisines is a great way to broaden your horizons and learn new things. Keep up the good work!
Thank you!
You're welcome! Do you have any other topics you would like to practice today?
Can you come up with a new topic?
Sure! How about we talk about your favorite holiday or vacation destination? Where have you been and what did you enjoy about it?
Can we change a new topic
Of course! How about we talk about your favorite hobby or activity? What do you like to do in your free time and why do you enjoy it?
We've talked about that before, can we have a new topic?
Sure! How about we talk about your favorite movie or TV show? What is it about and why do you like it?
